0863513baea99837.voiceContent: I was so surprised the first time I came in. Such a small teapot, and yet so vast on the inside..

0dc996705ce2df27.voiceContent: He was the king of warriors, gardeners, and intellectuals alike. He controlled the howling winds in the desert, the sand dunes silvered by moonlight..

13c3e7ed3eb06628.voiceContent: Although I may be a village guardian with her spear and shield ever at the ready... Deep down in my heart, I've always loved cozy and calm atmospheres like this

1de2b64da286f313.voiceContent: People may find it hard to admit, but lies often soothe the heart more than the truth ever could

1f0ca25f4d08f10d.voiceContent: His arrogant acts of folly led to his ruinous fate. The sands entombed his city, leaving only the sorrowful elegies of the Eremite songsters..

2c26fa9f9cf335e3.voiceContent: It's getting late. Now, off to bed you go

314ca4578b834a39.voiceContent: #Oh, it's you, {NICKNAME}. How have your recent travels been

33126353288c2350.voiceContent: It's quite different from Aaru Village, but I feel at ease here nonetheless

353ac616ef12a077.voiceContent: We had a difficult past, and our lives at the moment aren't exactly easy, but it's our peaceful lifestyles that I wish to defend

35b5d325bdd6b762.voiceContent: Just look at these intricate patterns and beautiful facades. The ancient style really adds a lot of character, and it's all the more majestic in such a tranquil environment

36d937b56e3f6b5e.voiceContent: Some time later, Aaru Village became a place of exile for scholars..

3b696bc71ba50c00.voiceContent: My apologies... Things got dark pretty quickly

3efd53dcf809e2cf.voiceContent: ...It is my homeland and the lives of everyone in it

40f7e03bd2f14eb9.voiceContent: Good morning. Did you rest well last night

4186739834e2a169.voiceContent: When that day comes, I shall follow your footsteps

42af97a9df634b63.voiceContent: Ah, it truly is a tempting offer... But I cannot forsake my duty to protect Aaru Village..

448eb11a2fbfc523.voiceContent: And, thank you for having me

4b9543ba128ed292.voiceContent: Well then... weary wanderer of lands beyond, do you wish to hear about the ancient legend of King Deshret, or the history of Aaru Village

56d7ea891c4dcfc9.voiceContent: A nation of trade and contracts... I've heard about it before, but your description paints a whole new picture

5ffaf47764d24e1e.voiceContent: And the thousand-and-one fairy folk who hide within the dreams of the night and the cries of the owl..

612428890f5313c0.voiceContent: King Deshret was an ancient god of the desert, known as Ahmar to the desert folk

6cd601e3c2c34769.voiceContent: You can sit by my side, or... something more casual, whatever makes you feel comfortable and relaxed

6d154cb7b4bc92cc.voiceContent: I hope the fathomless dark of the night will watch over your dreams and grant you a good night's sleep

7fb485f50fa3c688.voiceContent: I was simply musing. Even if that were possible, what I seek to protect is not an object named Aaru Village..

8216033244a4460c.voiceContent: I apologize for making you listen to all this..

839de9c1f72ca84c.voiceContent: I'd love to see it for myself

84c7d5d3a1aea66e.voiceContent: If you don't mind, could you tell me about the places you've been to? Any of them will do

86a5ef43f2096d2e.voiceContent: If I could store Aaru Village in a teapot..

8a6dcba637be75bc.voiceContent: As the god of the desert, King Deshret built a city from the golden sand and crimson rock, and called it Akhtamun.

9027f12dec994d85.voiceContent: I love Aaru Village's architectural style. Heh, I know I'm biased, but that's not the reason why

93d423c743bf6cad.voiceContent: Everything I seek to protect... it's all here

9516e5b0e7802e1a.voiceContent: But after hearing you speak of all these faraway lands, I can't help but find the thought of traveling quite... enchanting

95e8619975ee5e3b.voiceContent: Hmm... If I could easily take everyone someplace else..

a9085090243b9908.voiceContent: A land surrounded by the ocean, a castle built atop an island..

b017641f2f8f4c6e.voiceContent: Thank you for patiently listening to all that I had to say. It feels like a burden has been lifted from my heart

b38e88682e4fa67c.voiceContent: Even now, most desert folk remain devout believers in King Deshret. The rumor that he will one day be resurrected has become their only hope for the future

b656a3da97b2ef11.voiceContent: Sure, but what should we talk about...

c06093b0efa1dd44.voiceContent: No, I suppose they wouldn't agree to leaving the desert in the first place

c108764ebf3704d6.voiceContent: If there's anything you need, just tell me anytime

c2dbe2013dcb7999.voiceContent: When you have time, I'll tell you more stories of the interesting things that happen in our village

cd89b5b1cf5e5bdb.voiceContent: Great. So, just be yourself when you're around me

d0b3b23306a50956.voiceContent: The goddess of the night will be worried if you don't sleep well

e055451eb3330fab.voiceContent: ...Can I stay here and admire it for a little longer

e4a8d9ae6651af67.voiceContent: We are all born free, yet we are also inevitably bound by shackles

e693bc8050018a66.voiceContent: Verdant grass, a city of song and freedom..

e767b7b80d3cc433.voiceContent: Making a house feel like a home isn't about the physical objects. It's about creating a certain atmosphere..

e87459a1b0cfc028.voiceContent: Perhaps your words will take root within my heart, and one day, my desire to see the world beyond will sprout and grow

f28203b918c91c1d.voiceContent: The desert has been my home my entire life. I hardly even journey to the other side of the Wall of Samiel

f4c1f98babf5c353.voiceContent: In the past, the mountain and lake where Aaru Village is situated was a part of King Deshret's territory

f951e59d595aea4d.voiceContent: After King Deshret passed, the surviving residents of the city became the earliest inhabitants of Aaru Village, bringing their traditions and faith with them

fc91d3daf6770106.voiceContent: If you have time, would you like to hear me tell a story

02033adc84f00f5e.voiceContent: I was planning to follow the tradition here and make a few gift envelopes for them

0262fe228d9648eb.voiceContent: I'm not sure this scenario is quite that extreme

0434dc7d2d2fc761.voiceContent: Yes... But this time, I only heard faint voices

05591c4a793d4256.voiceContent: Yeah. I've been in the desert so long, I was worried I wouldn't be the best judge of the goods around here

06f3210ed8f98e04.voiceContent: Perhaps there's some kind of trigger condition... Or could it be because of my connection to Lord Al-Ahmar

0730074d401d2060.voiceContent: Funny enough, I heard a caravan was robbed just this morning, in a remote part of the desert

0b6f2f47e8400a72.voiceContent: You misunderstand, Miss Dori. We're just here for some information

0b820d20865d0226.voiceContent: Not yet... I still haven't determined if this is the true power of prophecy, and I don't want to make everyone worry

0c7f4ae886e250eb.voiceContent: Actually, I... I did see something. I saw the crate fall before it happened

0fc29ae8e2abf67d.voiceContent: Yes. All that's left of the transport wagon, I would imagine. Strange... the wood looks charred. Was there an explosion

13f16f4981cfb834.voiceContent: Thirty thousand Mora, plus food, shelter, and a security detail whenever you're in Aaru Village. I'll throw in a few tax exemptions as well. How does that sound

17ea6bfa3ff37490.voiceContent: They've been at Miss Dunyarzad's house the past couple of days, working on the candy decorations. I'm sure they have it under control

19f5a9ee06bdec0b.voiceContent: Yes, I feel the same way. Their leader was clearly hiding something. I think we can safely say those weren't simple firework shipments

1b83549705fbfdb4.voiceContent: Even if she remembers the story, I fear all that remains in this fragmented piece of memory... is grief

1d35c75cda346121.voiceContent: I don't think it's related to my amber eye. Growing up, it's never shown me any kind of strange phenomena..

1f95fa9c106c7e3f.voiceContent: Hmm... I guess you could call it... a gut feeling? It's hard to describe

202fe0e5bac65f6c.voiceContent: This is the final stop of the Carriage Parade, so many of the vendors decided to set up their stalls in advance. The city is a lot more lively than usual

29003157d21cc598.voiceContent: What happened? Can't be anything too bad, if Cyno's grinning from ear to ear

2aad26625a11b041.voiceContent: It's very possible. In any case, our biggest concern right now is the group that currently has the goods, and what their goal may be..

2caeed719872cb49.voiceContent: That exceeds our budget, I'm afraid. Can you go any lower

2f286a8b22090f55.voiceContent: There are intersecting sets of footprints on the ground. We could try tracking some of them..

2f6f785ee5e7a3bd.voiceContent: Yes. I'm providing the background music for Miss Nilou's dance

30a14961849d6079.voiceContent: Don't say that. I dragged you into my own personal investigation. I should be the one apologizing

38332eaf08c9a5f9.voiceContent: Heh, a few moments with me, and they'd be begging for their days of baking in the hot sun..

38708e077aa477b5.voiceContent: So, you're saying... we just happened to witness events that have occurred before

3a795d46c2709db6.voiceContent: Rest here for now, you two. I'll be back as soon as I've spoken to the guards

3ce1f9277d1cc8e9.voiceContent: Did anyone see her on the way here

3d350d4ede73b155.voiceContent: I bought a rather peculiar gem this morning, and I have the name of the merchant who sold it to me

3e28216088c6b0cf.voiceContent: Well, we don't necessarily have to track down that specific person. If you have a way of obtaining the information I seek, Miss Dori, I would be happy to compensate you for those services as well

3e64cabb06341d4a.voiceContent: #Happy Lantern Rite, {NICKNAME}. I heard about how you helped Dehya with the gift envelope. It was beautiful, thank you

47fe1e6a23763dd1.voiceContent: No... Unfortunately, the visions are very blurry. I could only catch a few words and some vague images..

4a98b2c5ef1c0d8d.voiceContent: We never received anything like that

4dfa4c6734939bac.voiceContent: I'm Candace, the guardian of Aaru Village. I'm trying to learn more about the robbery that took place this morning

4e58aeecade77f17.voiceContent: Sorry for making you worry. Let's go to that store and place an order

5586703b3fd70474.voiceContent: Are you here for the Sabzeruz Festival

5597cecd4e6f19bc.voiceContent: I will. Dehya wants to visit Qiaoying Village in a few days

5634672c5c36891c.voiceContent: Yes. According to the local gem merchants, the ore was retrieved from a nameless ruin in the desert several months ago. The ruin is in very poor condition. Even the writing on the walls is nearly impossible to read

56658284351dfde0.voiceContent: Let's go after them. Hopefully... Ugh! Ah..

5a867cffa27686b2.voiceContent: It's certainly possible. Here, try it for yourself. Maybe you'll see something as well..

5ac4533e099bb03e.voiceContent: Yes. The ore had a crack down the middle. The craftsman believed it would be impossible to repair, so they turned it into two gems instead

5c2ff601e0e53a92.voiceContent: Now, I just need to make a few more to give alongside the souvenirs I bought. I'm sure the people back home will love them

5ccb1c29732eedd8.voiceContent: Did it look anything like this

5e9fff1c2fcce774.voiceContent: Honestly, I think Miss Nilou's dancing was the real star of the event

5fa2bd0139230c74.voiceContent: You're safe now, little one. Just be careful next time

5fa548e4b6682401.voiceContent: But, Dehya packed our schedule to the brim, and with all the running around, I'm not sure I'll have the time..

60c01a138e4ac164.voiceContent: Dehya told me you're good at making gift envelopes. Could you show me how to make one

61ad78c5d2b6936a.voiceContent: No. I just wanted to remind you to keep an eye on the fire you've got going there. If you let it burn too long, it could become a safety hazard

67e1904b3c5132b3.voiceContent: I couldn't tell. The voices were too muffled

694450a17ecaeb04.voiceContent: Does that mean we can expect a discount

6a4a1d624b75f70e.voiceContent: Luckily, I don't have too many responsibilities over the next few days, so I can investigate on my own. It's part of my duty as a guardian.

6bd0fbebb1f63724.voiceContent: The situation could be even more precarious than we thought. Mmm... I don't think we should hide this any longer. Let's head back to Caravan Ribat and explain the situation to the guards

6c305e712b4bce6f.voiceContent: Let's go buy some fruit. We need it to make the candy

6d1a1c06b9005a94.voiceContent: #Alright, we should be out of ear-shot. So... what do you think, {NICKNAME}

6d39a94006105e85.voiceContent: Ah, now I know why people call you the number one merchant in Sumeru! Your generosity is truly unmatched

6e2c7d51b062f1ff.voiceContent: And you, Miss Dori. Safe travels. I'll see you tomorrow

6ffc8a0b81c7d23b.voiceContent: Did you see what they looked like

713a3b780df62091.voiceContent: Dehya told me you're good at making gift envelopes. Could you show me how to make one

71aa48186665eef6.voiceContent: I would still urge you to head to Caravan Ribat and report the incident. For your own safety, don't let your anger lead you to do something foolish

71c698a3185aa756.voiceContent: Take your time â€” your health and safety are more important. I'll just leave the deposit here

72cd6d63e50773a0.voiceContent: Yes... something similar happened with the stove. I saw what was about to happen..

74cb8e8d8a3ca405.voiceContent: I'm not sure that would be wise..

7bc63b2952a94789.voiceContent: Nothing out of the ordinary, really. I prayed to the gods, made my plan for the day, then went to meet my friends

7d70b42b9119af69.voiceContent: But, this one... I'm keeping just for me

7e5e0addd5857307.voiceContent: What if I add five orders of Samosas? Would that help lower the price

7f8a1a6e2a999857.voiceContent: What was it that you were transporting

80b4067fd51b9671.voiceContent: And where were you sending those goods

82657eb9f6a0e487.voiceContent: Judging by the traces, they must have turned left..

838f07489eb17fcc.voiceContent: Dehya said we can meet up with everyone later. If we hurry, we should be able to get back in time

83a55f8a4df381fa.voiceContent: Ah, what a shame... How about thirty thousand Mora, then

84287e48a48ab7dd.voiceContent: Haha, I rarely get to spend time with Cyno outside of work. I'm sure he's just happy you came back for the Sabzeruz Festival

897dcd25de8a2202.voiceContent: It's alright. Cyno has always been part of the plan

8a840ecb2efdac03.voiceContent: The same goes for Aaru Village. Everyone's doing their part to make this a truly unforgettable Sabzeruz Festival

8c4c5b0698aa2d95.voiceContent: Hmm... So, it doesn't work for just anyone

8d3f6f1842fd2d0f.voiceContent: But, ever since this morning, I've been seeing things that don't match with reality, and after a few seconds, they actually come to pass..

8fa016ccc5a9d2ed.voiceContent: We can look into the true cause of the problem a bit later. What matters now is that you're alright. Need any water? I've got some on me

93bee31c87fae22a.voiceContent: She just left. I got here early, and she had already started doing business, so we wrapped things up right away

950803378f05059a.voiceContent: I should've known you would say that. Thank you for all your help

9f6d1b84ed36d2a7.voiceContent: Alright, let's finish our shopping first, then we can investigate the gem. At the very least, we should ask around the merchant circles for information on its origins

a0de80f1c10f81ac.voiceContent: Exactly. Many among the desert tribes are capable of wielding elemental energy. The same is true for the Eremites. Some use that power to attack caravans and earn some quick Mora

a0e1e4d1e1f7fcab.voiceContent: I can't say for sure, but I do know this... Only small-scale caravans or ones carrying important goods travel on remote paths like that, and their routes are highly confidential..

aa62721d2b8ecc73.voiceContent: I was just thinking about Mr. Alhaitham's theory. It makes sense, until we factor in the robbery in the desert..

aabd8b4f8ebce319.voiceContent: Hmm? Someone's being interrogated? Did I miss something

aee3ef69c7fd42f8.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME}, you've only just made it back to Sumeru. Why don't you take some time for yourself? I'll handle the rest of the orders

afd2dcd57d025367.voiceContent: She said the scenery is beautiful, and the village is known for their tea. It's a perfect gift for the people back home

b06f75348ac9c2c7.voiceContent: Dori mentioned something even more concerning, though. Apparently, the craftsman made another gem just like this one

b3287e43714f193f.voiceContent: As long as it's not too much trouble..

b4ff6146382ee9e1.voiceContent: That's exactly what I'd like to know. If this gem truly provides the power of foresight, the consequences could be detrimental in the wrong hands

b5bd7ce0b446317a.voiceContent: I see traces of activity over there. Let's follow the road and see what we can find

b675d4b74c298878.voiceContent: (The faint voices I heard earlier... Could it actually have been Lord Al-Ahmar and the Goddess of Flowers?

b7e83912b40d8dc5.voiceContent: Oh, it's just something I do in passing. When the night watch is calm, and the stars are out, I like to play a few tunes to pass the time

b84e7a4ca8cae943.voiceContent: Excuse me, sorry for the interruption..

b8eaf6f7bd63b2c5.voiceContent: It was nothing. Don't blame yourself, Sheriff. I understand just how difficult it is to look after a whole region. Still, with the festival coming, we need your vigilance more than ever

bb40d35721a487c4.voiceContent: I want to ask the merchant about the craftsman who cut this gem, and where they got their ore

bcde665e5630107d.voiceContent: I can sympathize, of course. There's no need to be nervous. Although... is this where you plan to set up camp? Caravan Ribat isn't far, you know..

bd66fd30ccaa20ab.voiceContent: Of course. Thank you, Miss Dori. You've been a huge help

c05d1b58b8511a16.voiceContent: #Haha, noble as always. May the gods protect you, {NICKNAME}

c0adb7f7827dc042.voiceContent: And now, whatever hazardous materials they were transporting have fallen into the hands of another group of bandits

c47be8c4700b8e4d.voiceContent: Yes, it's all thanks to Dehya and the others. I can rest a little easier knowing the village is still protected while I'm gone

c48294bc85464f8a.voiceContent: Huh? Mr. Sethos, that item on your person..

c4f8e27e50d6662b.voiceContent: What do you plan to do with the two pieces of the Eye

c51881237dd2fdad.voiceContent: She left the city as soon as I handed her the travel permit and tax waiver I promised

c640c47266d62050.voiceContent: They seemed suspicious... I think they were talking about something dangerous..

c7552a0ee793945f.voiceContent: Alright, I think I understand the situation. Thank you for your cooperation

c7ef00a63c7d5f96.voiceContent: Wreaking havoc in the desert, trying to turn a profit by illegally excavating ruins and tombs... That's my guess

cc9b4cf4f147540e.voiceContent: We'd like to place an order for the Sabzeruz Festival. Could you have them ready for pickup after the parade

cdf7a1305a98c4c8.voiceContent: Although, if I had to think of something... I did buy this gem along the way

d19b4c6bd5ff3c40.voiceContent: I see what you mean. Their methods were precise and effective. It's very likely they're exploiting the visions granted by the gem

d3983b0a61977c71.voiceContent: I believe the robbery took place not too far from here

d51e9cf68ad8d0a0.voiceContent: Great, we'll take it. Thank you so much

d56a5a56b781deba.voiceContent: Heh... If you like it, you're welcome in Aaru village any time. I'm more than happy to lull you to sleep

d7bd12396e09c223.voiceContent: Yes... I saw... two people enter the alley over there..

d91a9180cef41fc3.voiceContent: Something wrong? That's usually the going rate for this kind of intel in the desert

dc79eef75f445cfb.voiceContent: So you sense it, too? This gem seems to contain traces of unusual elemental energy. I only bought it because it piqued my interest

de2467f99db4c3db.voiceContent: #So, that's how it's done... This gift envelope is wonderful, {NICKNAME}, thank you

e2c5bf1c62ca4ecb.voiceContent: This afternoon... Aren't we heading back to Port Ormos to work on the surprise

e2f45e537cfbbfaa.voiceContent: It sounded like two people having a conversation... There was someone asking, will she find out, and something about following the tracks..

e3eeeb2e0d4b0625.voiceContent: Right, we never told you who was involved... Apologies. That was our mistake

eaa31813c216d3f2.voiceContent: I see... Could you describe the robbery to us

ec077f5a08162217.voiceContent: Everyone's been so busy preparing for the festival. I really don't want to trouble them with something so trivial

ed68706f7e0c46c4.voiceContent: The traces are pointing this way..

ee9d8a993e7b8a95.voiceContent: We'll take three orders each of Masala Cheese Balls, Potato Boats, and Curry Shrimp, and ten orders of Panipuri

f079f05b86064138.voiceContent: I'll happily take you up on that offer, then

f19e798bf526419e.voiceContent: Even better! Having your company is like sitting around a bonfire with trusted companions â€” your presence puts people at ease

f273213fc04df39d.voiceContent: Of course, if you have other plans, please don't feel obliged to come with me

f2c7ad9d9fa70740.voiceContent: Ah, do you mean Dori? I've heard people talk about her in Aaru Village before

fd628c842bd56872.voiceContent: Tell us right away if you find anything

fdccb8766df96d4e.voiceContent: I would caution against that, especially when it looks like you're low on rations as it is. In the desert, impulsivity and overconfidence can be fatal

ffa4f06b7fcaa047.voiceContent: The footprints lead in that direction as well

023fd00c76f45bcb.voiceContent: I promise to keep you safe

0368fc1e21751325.voiceContent: What's wrong? Are you in danger

09e56531ce563a20.voiceContent: Perhaps it is a testament to the Dendro Archon's benevolence that I, a descendant of the Al-Ahmar bloodline, am able to live peacefully on this land. If so, I suppose I am grateful for this much, but... I am first and foremost a child of the desert

0dbe72a94da47245.voiceContent: This strange powder, it is... fine, like sand, but white as the clouds, and cold as ice..

0fbee53ed48922e7.voiceContent: Aaru Village is where I was born and grew up. Even back when I was too young to understand anything else about the world, the one thing I knew for sure was that one day, I would take over from my grandfather as sworn protector of our village... Today, I am grateful to now hold this duty. It is what I was born to do

10d2a0e7699179a3.voiceContent: You will always be an honored guest of Aaru Village, no matter the day or time of your visit. If ever you tire of your journey, know that here, you can always find rest. Aaru Village welcomes you with open arms... as do I

11d92bb14df8aba8.voiceContent: Wow, I wasn't counting on winning. Seems like luck's on my side today

1359532319adb40c.voiceContent: It's already noon. The golden eye of the sky glares down fiercely at this hour... Hehe, we should find some shade and escape its wrath

175cfde1aea59c9e.voiceContent: I am now capable of venturing ahead of you, and fending off all dangers that would seek to come your way. If you trust me, then I invite you to close your eyes and leave the enemies to me

17bc51d5af3e5a3a.voiceContent: They say that in every person's heart is a precious box, into which they place the things they treasure, so that they may guard them for their entire life. My heart harbors many treasures... Care to guess what those might be

1f10fa791ec4ae1f.voiceContent: Hah... That was a rather stunning victory on my part, wouldn't you say

214c472205274edc.voiceContent: I'd really love to look into your future with my amber eye, if I could... Something tells me everything would be golden... somewhere between the color of sunlight and honey. A color filled with hope. Your journey will be a smooth road ahead. I give it my blessing

22763333afa94cfe.voiceContent: Even now, there are those who hold on to a belief that King Deshret will be resurrected. But it's not possible. The past is but grains of sand, scattered to the four winds. The best we can do is to let go, and leave the wind to carry them to their final resting place

23bf47610789da7e.voiceContent: Welcome, weary Traveler from afar. Nights in the desert are cruel. You should rest here tonight. Sleep soundly, and know that I am watching over you

247640125daddba6.voiceContent: In the past, it was rare to see the Akademiya's General Mahamatra on this side of the Wall of Samiel, but recently he has been showing up here all the time. I believe that the Eremites have some truly terrifying stories to tell about him..

255762f0630c0859.voiceContent: I don't hate it, but compared to regular meat, eating fish is a real nuisance... Maybe it's because we don't really eat fish here in the desert, but for whatever reason, I'm just not very good at removing all those prickly little bones... This must sound ridiculous to you

335123266bf9eac4.voiceContent: I always love taking walks in the village. Seeing that all is still well gives me a sense that... if today is just like yesterday, and yesterday is just like all the days before it... things have always been pleasant here, throughout history

3bffaf577e869d2a.voiceContent: A truly unusual scholar, unlike any other I've ever met. He sees and thinks about things in his own unique way... I only hope he never wields his sharp mind against the peace of Aaru Village

4c089d35fa46ffd2.voiceContent: For someone who spends so much time on the road, your cooking tastes so... homely

4cf32c9a2013c00d.voiceContent: What do you think? Anything catch your eye

4d225fb02cb2f5f8.voiceContent: Mmm, absolutely delightful! This must have taken a lot of time and effort

50851bcfcd339f59.voiceContent: Every now and then, a few violent thugs make the mistake of trying to disrupt the peace and tranquility of Aaru Village. I do wonder... is chasing them into a monster-infested valley perhaps a little too... merciful? What do you think, do you have any better ideas on how they should be dealt with

52a2461a4836f19e.voiceContent: Maybe my definition of edible is a little too old-fashioned..

61ef4345dc76dede.voiceContent: My father was a scholar from the Akademiya. He originally came to Aaru Village on a research trip, and then he met my mother... As for her, unfortunately I only know what my father has told me. The day I was born, she began her journey into the eternal night..

66f3fa67b71f88c6.voiceContent: I will always seek to protect the things that are most important, no matter what it takes... even when it looks futile

69ab102d8855e60d.voiceContent: ...Strange? I'm not sure what you mean, both amber and blue are fairly common eye colors, I believe..

6aeb45a7d20b8ce9.voiceContent: You beat me... Guess I'm playing in the big leagues now, heh

6af091d27822f4fc.voiceContent: My shield grows sturdier, and my spear sharper. One is an unstoppable force, the other an immovable object... Oh, but... I would never pit these against each other

730b0953fb4e3c5a.voiceContent: The night sky... that great canopy that descends when the light of day is gone. Who knows how many untold secrets it conceals..

757e082c6056fdab.voiceContent: The sons and daughters of King Deshret are a proud people, and he is no exception. I have heard his tale, of Hermanubis's glory dwelling within a worthy vessel. I also understand he has been active in Sumeru City recently? Apparently, he has spoken to Cyno and other friends of his plans to visit Aaru Village. I look forward to hosting him

7b88552a33bc3a87.voiceContent: We are a people whose god is no longer with us. Lies pose no threat to us... the threat we face is the prospect of no tomorrow. The path before us is paved with barbs, there is pain in every step â€” yes, we tread forward clinging to a lie, but perhaps... perhaps there is more virtue in this than in selfishly embracing the truth, and death along with it..

7be72762bacc9b0d.voiceContent: To me... quantity is more important than taste when it comes to food. Life in the desert uses up more energy than you might think. After a day's work, there's nothing more satisfying than having a filling meal

7c647996c25f726f.voiceContent: Sure. But I apologize in advance if I'm no good â€” I've only played against kids from the village before

818d0e7a023dc9e8.voiceContent: A shield is not enough to protect the most important things. That's why I must also wield a spear

885d1251979e7ed8.voiceContent: Mmm, absolutely delightful! This must have taken a lot of time and effort

8ba181715c5b808a.voiceContent: Whenever Dehya brings any of her Eremites to stay at Aaru Village, she always keeps them on their very best behavior. I have to say, it makes my life a lot easier. Ah, Dehya... She might look like trouble at first, but the truth is that she's really quite adorable

8cca611923e09a6d.voiceContent: My shield? Well, according to what people outside the village say, it has the blessing of Bennu. With this shield in hand, all the grains of sand are my eyes and ears, and the desert is ready to do my bidding... Their imaginations can get a little carried away sometimes. But anyway, that aside, the main thing for me is it always works like a charm

99c1a881a32417f2.voiceContent: For someone who spends so much time on the road, your cooking tastes so... homely

9b2afe24c5c5a6d6.voiceContent: I am right by your side. But if you're still nervous, just take my hand

a7eb808561c7f7e2.voiceContent: Stay warm, or you'll catch a cold

b149f9558731a6ec.voiceContent: An eccentric girl who always seems to be in a trance...? Yes, I believe I've seen her before â€” near the Wall of Samiel. I couldn't make sense of what she was saying, nor the calculations she wrote down, but she seemed to be in a much better mood after she'd finished. Perhaps this is her way of relieving stress

b485ec93aa5e5498.voiceContent: I suppose the occasional game now and then can't do any harm

b6a14da1a57c95b1.voiceContent: When I received my Vision, people in the village kept telling me it was a blessing from Ahmar... but that doesn't matter to me. I swore to protect the village, and I will do it with or without a Vision

c161fb94085d1c19.voiceContent: The thunder rumbles â€” does it scare you

c3e71502c4c85bd8.voiceContent: Have you come across Ajilenakh Nuts yet on your journey? They're naturally very sweet, and the villagers make the most delicious candies from them. If you're interested, you should give them a try

c5ff18829ab22cb6.voiceContent: I'm in awe. You played a flawless game

c7efc84fb182f56a.voiceContent: Yes, it's time to rest. You should sleep. Me? It's still much too early. The night is beautiful, but it's also full of danger... I must keep watch, for your sake

cbd891ae60e90884.voiceContent: I'm afraid there's no room for mercy

d248e742e90f9820.voiceContent: You want to know more about me? ...I can't promise you a great story, but if you insist... Okay, let's wait until nightfall. We can sit by the fireside and I'll tell you all you wish to know

d544bfb7ec5a4193.voiceContent: I feel a newfound strength within me... May it help me to be a better protector

d66eabc996dc3f8d.voiceContent: I learned to wield the spear and shield knowing that I would one day need them, and today I use these skills to protect the village. So perhaps this new strength I now gain in the present is preparing me for trials that lie ahead in the future

e14a0fd6720617b4.voiceContent: In the desert, a strong gale like this will create a sandstorm, so it's always a good idea to stay alert

e17512a3015a757c.voiceContent: I hope you can find some use for these

e43775b2533f0292.voiceContent: I do love spending time in Aaru Village. But each day I spend here is also a reminder that if I ever start to let my guard down... sooner or later, the day may come when I no longer have a life to return to here

e7a20f89c6f4347e.voiceContent: Maybe my definition of edible is a little too old-fashioned..

e94892e3e91bc13b.voiceContent: Happy birthday! It's amazing to think that you were born on this day, years ago in the past. Do you have a birthday wish? If it involves going somewhere dangerous, let me join you â€” I'll be your guard. Or if you're looking to rest and revitalize, come to Aaru Village, and I'll serve you the finest meats and drinks we have

ec175c5f76a2dcaf.voiceContent: Peace and good health should be enjoyed by all... If I can provide everyone with a life such as this, I will be content

f9cbe411ae2869d0.voiceContent: Good morning, Traveler. Did you sleep soundly last night
